appDescription: Enter a URL to download MP3 files and play them instantly

history.title: Download History
history.empty: No downloads yet. Download some MP3 files to see them here.

rename.title: Rename File
rename.description: Enter a new name for this file. The file extension will be preserved.
rename.label: File name

delete.title: Delete File
delete.descriptionExists: This will delete the file from your computer and remove it from history.
delete.descriptionMissing: This will remove the file from your history.
delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{fileName}}"?

toast.fileNotFoundDesc: The file "{{fileName}}" no longer exists at the specified location.
toast.folderOpenFailed: Cannot open folder for a file that no longer exists.
